summary: REQ-12 appears implemented by updating the HeroSection <h1> styling to use responsive font sizes and safe wrapping (break-words, hyphens-auto) while keeping the headline text unchanged. However, the diff also modifies non-requested metadata/summary files, which goes beyond the constraint to apply changes only to the selected element.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified non-requested project metadata/summary files (frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json) despite the constraint to apply changes ONLY to the selected Hero <h1> element.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrained changes to only the selected Hero headline element; updating repository summary/state files was not requested as part of REQ-12.
